segments.text: I'm watching the kitchen, and I can almost feel the tension building.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware, living in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite astonishing how focused she is on that one plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The moment she realizes the flood, her reaction will be priceless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll shriek, or just stand there in utter disbelief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then, the children's cookie adventure is heading for its own climax.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is definitely going to tip; it's just a matter of when.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the crash, the splash, and the ensuing chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The silence of their secret operation will be shattered very soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This tranquil drawing is holding a series of impending surprises.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me wonder how often we miss crucial details in our own lives.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is like a ticking time bomb of domestic accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to get wet, and someone is definitely going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mess that's about to be created.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a truly remarkable tableau of everyday hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR
